PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE
	{	?s dcat:distribution ?o }
INSERT
	{ 	?s dcat:distribution ?newo }
WHERE
	{ 	?s dcat:distribution ?o .
		BIND ( STR(?o) as ?stro )
		BIND ( IRI(CONCAT("http://data.gov.be/dist/vlaanderen/", MD5(?stro))) 
				as ?newo )
	}
